name: Hogwards
story: you are in Hogwarts, you are in a search of the most powerful wand
nav:
Press 1 to proceed to Library
Press 2 to Forest

name: Library
story: Greate decision� its important to collect the whole inforormation and get the map before starting an advrnture
nav:
Press 1 to search  restricted bookshelf
Press 2 to search  non-restricted bookshelf

name: Nonrestrictedshelf
story: Oh no �. In nonrestricted shelf you cannot find the information on mystery things
nav:
Press 1 to search  restricted bookshelf
Press 2 to leave the library

name: Restrictedshelf
story: Wow!!! You have chosen the correct shelf to find the map
nav:
Press 1 to proceed to dark forest
Press 2 to check more information in non restricted section

name: forest
story: This dark forest. you are alone. you saw a cave on your way. if you are brave choose the next step but you missed to collect the map
nav:
Press 1 to go back the Library
Press  2 to enter the cave

name: cave
story: Welcome to the cave you heard a weird sound on your head and 3 way to go into the cave which one you choose
nav:
Press 1 to go EAST
Press 2 to go WEST
Press 3 to go back to Forest

name: east
story: you are on the east side, the sound getting closer.you saw two doors green and golden.time is limited you need to choose one
nav:
Press 1  to proceed through the green door
Press 3 to move towards the sound
Press 2 to proceed through the goldendoor

name: lordvoldemort
story: Oops...you are out of time to choose a path, lord Voldemort found you and started fighting with him. Lord Voldemort used his  power and you are helpless finally he killed you.......... you lose

name: greenpath
story: This is a room where time doesn't run.You can relax and prepare for your next decisions and tasks
nav:
Press 1 to go back cave
Press 2 to enter the goldenroom

name: goldenpath
story: You have chosen the golden.This which you can acquire more power and you saw a bowl of soup in the table
nav:
Press 2 to proceed west path
press 1 drink the Soup

name: Soup
story: Delicious � you got more magical power to proceed further .But you continue to hear the weird noises
nav:
Press 1 to follow the noise
Press 2 to proceed with west way

name: west
story: Yay!!! You have choosen the West side .... you are taking a walk through the west path you found a looked wooden box and a bell. You here someone  is calling for help.
nav:
Press 1  to go back to darkforest.
Press 2 take the bell
Press 3 to open the box

name: Bell
story: Oops the bell started to make sound by itsown �. you have to waken up the sleeping dragon
nav:
Press 1  fight back with the dragon with your wand
Press 2  runback and hide in the dark

name: Dragon
story: OMG. It's a giant dragon you had to fight really hard  to kill it and collect the dragon tooth.you managed to kill the deagon and collected the dragon tooth. You continue hearing the noise
nav:
Press 1 to open the box
Press 2  to go back to the cave entrance

name: Dark
story: You hide in the dark and when the dragon moves away you still hear a helping noise from the box
nav:
Press 1 to open the box
Press 2  to go back to the cave entrance

name: Box
story: Hi I am Dobby...you are my master now how can i help you? Will you seek help from him
nav:
Press 1   to seek help
Press 2  to reject and go back to cave

name: Dobby
story: Dobby will obey his master,you ask him to take you to the secret chambers and dobby ask you to take his hand
nav:
Press 1 takes his hand
Press 2  to reject

name: Space
story: You are in Space now �...Dobby was angry he wants to scare you�...

name: secret chambers entrance
story: You are in the secret chamber. You don�t have key to open it there is 2 switches you need to choose one
nav:
Press 1  Ask for help from dobby
Press 2  Use your wand to open

name: secret chambers
story: Wow!!!! You are awesome you got the most powerful wand and now you saved the world
